com.google.android.exoplayer.text.ttml

Class TtmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.text.ttml.TtmlParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubtitleParser

    public final class TtmlParser
extends Object
implements SubtitleParser
    A simple TTML parser that supports DFXP presentation profile.

    Supported features in this parser are:

    • content
    • core
    • presentation
    • profile
    • structure
    • time-offset
    • timing
    • tickRate
    • time-clock-with-frames
    • time-clock
    • time-offset-with-frames
    • time-offset-with-ticks

    See Also:
    TTML specification

        public TtmlSubtitle parse(byte[] bytes,
                 int offset,
                 int length)
                   throws ParserException
        Description copied from interface: SubtitleParser
        Parses a Subtitle from the provided byte[].
        Specified by:
        parse in interface SubtitleParser

        length - The length of the subtitle data in bytes.
